title: The PBS Version Of 'Wolf Hall' Unfolds Like A Real-Life House Of Cards
teaser: The show, based on Hilary Mantel's acclaimed novel, stars Mark Rylance as Thomas Cromwell, Henry VIII's chief minister. Critic John Powers says it's darkly lit, finely acted and thoroughly compelling.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
